3. blue teddy bear
4. gold necklace

The question asks what the color of the thing directly to the right of the mauve thing is. 

Since the mauve thing is the second object in the list, the object to the right of it is the gold necklace, which is the last object in the list.

Therefore, the color of the thing directly to the right of the mauve thing is gold. The answer is (N) gold.
